mapper.update: update adminmenu set iPermId = #{permId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, vMenuName = #{menuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, iIsRootNavi = #{isRootNavi,jdbcType=INTEGER}, iParentMenuId = #{parentMenuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, vUrl = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, iMenuOrder = #{menuOrder,jdbcType=INTEGER} where iMenuId = #{menuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select iMenuId, iPermId, vMenuName, iIsRootNavi, iParentMenuId, vUrl, iMenuOrder from adminmenu
